message: Is there a clean way to tell cProfile.run how many times to execute the specified function?
I feel dirty throwing loops into my functions just for the sake of getting more interesting stats out of cProfile
I'm thinking something along the lines of timeit, just with more details

Is there a reason not to just do cProfile with something like [ foo() for i in range(0, 3) ]? If you're testing something insanely quick, you're probably going to be dominated by things like function call overhead anyway
@acdha thanks for the suggestion! I'll probably end up trying your suggestion next time I need to profile something
